verses.content: “Râwla sakêl chun ieng hun laiin am tê a nei ti i hriet am? Sazuk chun tê a nei lai în chik thei am?
Thla iengzât am an pai ti i tiem thei am? Annawleh, ieng hun laiin am tê an nei ti i hriet am?
Anni chu an bawk a, an tê chu an hung nei a, An lungngainahai chu an pei suok tah a.
An têhai chu ditumtakin an um a, phûl âwla chun an hung inṭhang lien tah a, An fe suok a, an puihai kuomah an hung kîr nâwk ta nawh a.
Ram sabengtung chu tuin am zalênin ân suoktir a? Annawleh, ram sabengtung thlungna hruihai chu tuin am a sût a?
Chu in ding chun thlalêr ka siem a, A umna dingin chi ram leh.
Khawpui risie chu a hmusit a, Khaltuhai khêk rihai chu a hriet ngai bawk nawh.
Tlâng dunghai chu a bu petna hmun a na, Thil hring taphawt chu a zawng hlak.
“Ramsiel chu nangma rawng bâwl dingin a lungawi ding am a nih? Annawleh, i ran ina chun a chêng ding am a nih?
Ramsiel chu a khitna hrui chun ruoma chun i thlung thei ding am a nih? Annawleh, nanga hnunga chun ruomhai chu a chawkruol ding am a nih?
A hrâtna chu a nasa leiin, ama chu i ring ding maw? Annawleh, ama kuoma chun i sininrimna chu în nghat ding am a nih?
I chihai chu inah ama chun hung lâng a ta, I hrizâwl bu chu ama chun hung la khâwm a tih tiin ama chu i ring ngam chie am a nih?
Ostrik thlahai chu chapotakin an khâwng a, Nisienlakhawm, hmangaina thla le hmulhai an ni am a nih?
A tuihai chu hnuoia chun a mâksan a, Pilvuta chun a suklum sih a.
Kein sir kawi rawi a tih ti amanih, Annawleh, ramsa chun sir rawi a tih ti chu a ngaituo nawh.
A têhai chunga chun a kâwmaw a, ama tê naw ang elin, A sininrimna chu a thlâwn el a ni ding chu a ṭi nawh.
Pathien chun ama chu varna chu theinghil dinga siemin, A kuoma chun hrietthiemna a lo pêk bawk naw leiin.
Chungtienga ama chu ân lêng sâng pha chun, Sakawr le a chunga chuong chu a hmusit a.
“Sakawr chu a hrâtna nangin i pêk am a nih? A rîng chu thahrui chun în thuom bawk am a nih?
Ama chu khâuṭhikṭhi anga inchâwm thei dingin i siem am a nih? A hnârkhâwng dut dut ṭiumzie dâm hi?
Ruoma chun ân châwm a, a hrâtnaa chun a hlim a, Mi inrâlthuomhai chu tuok dingin a fe suok a.
Ṭitna chu a nuisan a, a beidawng nawh a, Kâwlhnâma inthawk khawma a tlânse ngai bawk nawh.
A chunga chun thalbâwm chu ân ri thuok thuok a, Fei le thal tle zawk zawk hai le chun.
Lunginsenna le ṭitnain hnuoi chu a lem a, Tawtawrâwt riah a ngir ṭawkṭawk thei nawh a.
Tawtawrâwt chu ân ri po leh, ‘Aha,’ a ta, Hlataka inthawkin indona chu a rim a hriet a, Sipai hotuhai khêkri le an êngri chu.
“Mu hi nanga varnain a birin, A thlahai chu simtieng a phar am a nih?
Muvânlai chu insângtaka inlêng a, Chungtienga a bu siem chu nanga thupêk am a nih?
Râwlkhoa chun a um a, chutaka chun riekna chu a nei a; Kul dettak le lungpui kak kâr chunga chun,
Chutaka inthawk chun a safâk ding chu a hmuh a, A mithai chun hlataka inthawk chun a en a.
A têhai khawmin thisen an dâwn a, Inthatna umna hmuna chun, chutaka chun a um a nih,” tiin.
